about_the_game:
Devastablance: Mountain Brotherhood is a game set in a post—apocalyptic world where you will find many quests, puzzles and unique mechanics. During the adventure, you will have to face various obstacles, strong opponents and ambiguous choices. Dynamic storytelling and a variety of gameplay will not let you get bored! Travel, defend, fight and strive to achieve your goals! Save humanity and your people! Remember: the fate of this world depends on you!

BACKGROUND

The nuclear war that split time into before and after was the result of a conflict between Humans and Magicians. There were no conquered and conquered, the sky was covered with the ashes of war for centuries. When people came to the surface again and saw the rays of the sun, they were overtaken by new threats. People were divided into factions, and each had its own philosophy. You are the head of a faction of "Scavengers" - people who are trying in vain to bring back balance to this world, which everyone has long forgotten about. You have a high position among the people, a small army and influence, but this is not enough to prevent the death of mankind. The strongest faction, a huge Horde consisting of magicians and their necromancer brothers, wants to conquer new lands. Everyone will have to unite in the face of a common threat. Go a long way, overcoming many obstacles, making new allies and completing the history of this world! Don't let humanity down, it's you who can change everything!

・Many different locations.

・Many different game modes.

・Lots of interactive characters.

・Lots of bosses and multiple endings.

・Your decisions affect the game, including the difficulty of passing it.

・A rich plot with a deeply developed universe.

・The game takes more than two hours to complete.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features unrealistic violence of fictional characters using unrealistic blood. At some points in the game there are unrealistic corpses,
unrealistic individual parts of the human body.
